title: RPG Character System - Constructor Function
description: Create an RPG character using constructor functions. Learn how constructor functions work, instance creation, and property initialization.

concepts.constructor_functions: Functions that create and initialize objects when called with 'new' keyword
concepts.this_keyword: Refers to the object being created or the object that called the method
concepts.new_keyword: Creates a new instance and sets up the prototype chain
concepts.instance_properties: Properties unique to each object created by the constructor

learning_outcomes: Understand constructor functions as object creation pattern
Use the 'new' keyword to create instances
Work with 'this' keyword to set instance properties
Compare constructor functions with factory functions
